summary: Implements a WSGI/werkzeug application that inspects each incoming HTTP request, extracts the Host header and request details, determines the target AWS service, version and action, selects the appropriate Moto backend, and forwards the request. It also handles signed versus unsigned actions, converts backend responses to Flask-compatible responses, and manages threadâ€‘safe backend registration.
business_intent: Enable developers to run a local mock AWS environment for testing and development by routing HTTP calls to simulated service backends, eliminating the need to interact with real AWS endpoints.
